dict.acceptation: 上帝，造物主；被极度崇敬的人[物]；男神；戏院顶层楼座观众；

sent.orig: Including the emergence of God, God's genealogy, God's daily life and the origin of mankind.
sent.trans: 主要包括神的产生、神的系谱、神的日常生活和人类的起源。

sent.orig: God is love, and he who abides in love abides in God, and God in him.
sent.trans: 住在爱里面的，就是住在神里面，神也住在他里面。

sent.orig: Everybody should get to believe in God. Pray to his God, worship his God-of course.
sent.trans: 每个人都应该信自己的神，向自己的神祈祷，崇拜自己的神。

sent.orig: God bless you all, god bless we all, god bless Amkor!
sent.trans: 上帝保佑你们，上帝保佑我们，上帝保佑安靠！

sent.orig: The underlying principle is that God's people obeyed God when they recognized God's will.
sent.trans: 基本原则就是，当神的子民确认神的旨意的时候，他们便顺服神。
